title: Karen Matthews has mushy peas 'thrown over her' at fish and chip shop | Metro News
text:
Karen Matthews has mushy peas ‘thrown over her’ at fish and chip shop Charles White Sunday 12 Feb 2017 4:19 pm Karen Matthews is ‘living in fear’ according to source (Pictures: Dave Thompson/PA Wire) 
Karen Matthews, who pretended her daughter was missing, has been covered in mushy peas in her local chippie. 
The 41-year-old who served four years for her crimes was doused in hot vegetables by an outraged woman, according to the Mirror . Millennials £2,700,000,000,000 worse off because of previous generation’s decisions 
Britain’s ‘most hated mother’ was attacked by a fellow customer in the chip shop where she was buying her £4.50 dinner. 
Matthews, a mum-of-seven, was said to have had the side dish thrown in her face and on to the duffel coat she was wearing. 
The vigilante attacker is also said to have shouted: ‘You evil b***h. I’m a mother too.’ The mum-of-seven was buying her £4.50 supper when attacked (Pictures: Shutterstock) 
A new BBC drama based on Matthews’ crimes has left her ‘fearing for her life’ according to close sources, and it is claimed she even wants plastic surgery. 
The Moorside stars Gemma Whelan of Game of Thrones fame and has apparently caused Karen to become distressed. 
Stars like Jodie Marsh have taken to Twitter after the show to express their disgust. 
The reality star wrote: ‘I’d go as far as to say that it’s ppl like Karen Matthews who make me think we should all be sterilised from birth then vetted to have kids.’ I'd go as far as to say that it's ppl like Karen Matthews who make me think we should all be sterilised from birth then vetted to have kids 
— Jodie Marsh (@JodieMarsh) February 7, 2017 
A source said: ‘She was glad it was just a few peas but next time it could be worse. She was living quite a peaceful life until this programme came along. 
‘But Karen being Karen, she doesn’t think it is anything to do with what she did by kidnapping her daughter.’ 
Toddler unconscious for 40 minutes after dysentery outbreak hits UK Matthews has long been vilified after pretending the then nine-year-old Shannon had been kidnapped. 
Living in Dewsbury, West Yorkshire, she let her daughter be housed in a dark flat by her partner’s uncle Michael Donovan. 
The source said: ‘She is a long way from Dewsbury and has only been recognised a couple of times in a year. Shannon Matthew was nine when her mum arranged for her kidnap (Pictures: West Yorkshire Police/PA Wire) 
‘But now with this new drama on the telly she’s petrified. The show is bringing her crimes to the attention of a lot of more people who were younger at the time and weren’t aware of what she did.’ More
